modmenu.descriptionTranslation.rituals:
Transform your world with mystical totems and powerful ritual magic!

§6Features:§r
• Six totem tiers (Wood → Netherite)
• Fire Sacrifice activation system
• Six unique rituals (Growth, Healing, Protection, Sentry, Strength, Prosperity)
• Beautiful particle effects and visual feedback
• Kiwi Mode for easy learning
• Badge progression system
• Fully configurable via in-game commands

§aUse §e/rituals help§a to get started!
modmenu.summaryTranslation.rituals: Mystical totems, fire sacrifices, and powerful ritual magic with stunning visual effects!
